nodes.text: Team Three was a squad of B1-series battle droids that served within the Separatist Droid Army of the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars against the Galactic Republic in 19 BBY. The team was stationed on the planet Mokivj and patrolled its droid factory and cortosis mine.

While on Mokivj, Team Three was tasked by Serennian Duke Solha with getting the workers within the droid factory to where they would unload a shipment of supplies from the Separatist freighter Larkrer under the team's supervision. Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker secretly used the freighter in order to find his wife, the Republic Senator Padmé Amidala, on the planet, where he was accompanied by the Chiss Senior Captain Thrawn and the astromech droid R2-D2.
Team Three appeared in the 2018 novel Thrawn: Alliances, the second installment of the Star Wars: Thrawn trilogy written by Timothy Zahn.
